title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm the user is redirected to the customizable dashboard.
Verify user-specific key business metrics are displayed on the dashboard.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and proper error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is denied with an appropriate error message.
Ensure no dashboard is accessible without authentication.

title: Dashboard Metrics Accuracy and Responsiveness
description: Validate that the dashboard displays accurate real-time metrics and charts, and is responsive across devices.

steps.description: Login with valid user credentials.
Verify all key metrics and visual data summaries load correctly and reflect real-time data.
Resize the browser window and access dashboard on mobile device.
Confirm layout adjusts properly and remains usable on different screen sizes.

title: CRM Module - Lead Creation and Validation
description: Check the creation of a new lead via modal in CRM and validate required inputs and error handling.

steps.description: Navigate to the CRM module and open the 'Create Lead' modal.
Enter valid lead information including name, contact details, and lead source.
Submit the lead creation form.
Verify the lead is added to the CRM leads list with accurate data.
Open 'Create Lead' modal, submit empty or invalid data.
Confirm validation errors are displayed and submission is blocked.

title: Project Management - Task Board Manipulation
description: Verify users can create, move, and edit tasks on the project task board, including edge cases like invalid data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Project Management module's Task Board.
Create a new task with valid title, assigned user, and due date.
Verify the new task appears correctly on the task board.
Drag and drop the task to a different status column.
Confirm task status updates accordingly and is saved.
Edit the task with invalid data such as empty title.
Check for validation errors preventing invalid updates.

title: Finance Module - Invoice Creation and Payment Processing
description: Ensure creating invoices with valid data works correctly and payment can be recorded via modal.

steps.description: Navigate to Finance -> Invoices and open the 'Create Invoice' modal.
Fill required invoice fields including client, items, amounts, and tax configurations.
Submit invoice creation.
Verify new invoice appears in the invoice list with correct details and tax applied.
Open 'Record Payment' modal for the new invoice.
Enter payment details and submit.
Confirm invoice status updates to paid or partially paid with accurate payment record.

title: Marketing Module - Campaign Creation and Lead Scoring
description: Test creation of marketing campaigns and application of lead scoring rules with valid and invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Marketing -> Campaigns and open 'Create Campaign' modal.
Enter valid campaign name, start/end dates, and targeted leads.
Submit campaign creation.
Verify campaign is created and listed correctly.
Navigate to Lead Scoring and create a new scoring rule with conditions and points.
Check scoring rule applies correctly to leads and impacts lead scores.
Attempt to create a scoring rule with missing conditions.
Confirm proper validation error is shown and rule creation is blocked.

title: Document Management - Contract Upload and E-Signature Flow
description: Verify uploading a contract document, assigning e-signatures, and maintaining version history functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to Documents -> Contracts and upload a new contract file.
Confirm contract is saved and appears in the contract list.
Initiate e-signature process on the uploaded contract.
Verify e-signature requests are sent, and signed documents update status accordingly.
Upload an updated version of the contract.
Ensure version history tracks the new version separately and preserves earlier versions.

title: Reports & Analytics - Custom Dashboard Creation and Export
description: Validate creating custom reports dashboards, viewing them, and exporting report data in supported formats.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports -> Builder and create a new custom dashboard with selected widgets.
Save and view the new dashboard.
Verify widgets display accurate and updated data.
Export the dashboard report data in CSV and PDF formats.
Confirm exports complete successfully with correct data content.

title: Helpdesk System - Ticket Lifecycle and SLA Compliance
description: Test creating, updating, resolving support tickets, and verifying SLA tracking and escalation behavior.

steps.description: Navigate to Helpdesk -> Tickets and create a new support ticket with valid details.
Confirm ticket is created and visible in the ticket list with correct metadata.
Update ticket status through various stages (open, in progress, resolved).
Verify status updates, notifications, and activity feeds reflect changes.
Simulate SLA time expiry and observe escalation or alert triggers.
Check SLA warnings and escalations are generated as per configuration.

title: HR Management - Employee Directory and Leave Requests
description: Validate employee records management and leave request submission, approval, and tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to HR -> Directory and add a new employee via modal form with all required data.
Verify the new employee appears correctly in the directory list.
Submit a leave request form for the employee.
Confirm leave request appears in pending approvals.
Approve and reject leave requests and verify the employee's leave balance updates accordingly.

title: Asset Management - Registering and Tracking Inventory Items
description: Check the process of adding new assets and inventory stock levels with updates and validations.

steps.description: Navigate to Assets -> Register and open the 'Create Asset' modal.
Enter valid asset details and submit.
Confirm the asset is listed with accurate information.
Update stock levels and record purchase orders.
Verify stock and purchase records update accurately and reflect current inventory.

title: Billing System - Recurring Billing and Contract Library Access
description: Test creation, modification, and proper billing cycles for recurring billing plans and access contract library.

steps.description: Navigate to Billing -> Recurring Billing and create a new recurring billing plan.
Set billing frequency, amount, and linked contract.
Save the billing plan.
Confirm billing plan appears with correct details and activates on schedule.
Access Billing -> Contract Library and review contract documents.
Verify contracts load correctly and support search and filtering.

title: Workflow Automation - Event Triggers and Approval Chains
description: Validate creation and execution of workflow automations using event triggers, scheduled tasks, and multi-step approval chains.

steps.description: Navigate to Workflow -> Builder and create a workflow with event trigger conditions.
Configure approval chain with multiple approvers and conditional steps.
Activate the workflow.
Trigger the event and confirm the approval chain routes correctly to designated approvers.
Set scheduled task within the workflow.
Verify the scheduled task executes at configured times.

title: Collaboration Tools - Chat Comments and Activity Feeds
description: Test sending chat messages, posting comments, and verifying activity feed entries for collaboration accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to Collaboration -> ChatComments and send a chat message.
Confirm the message appears for all relevant team members in real time.
Post comments on a project or task.
Verify comments display correctly and associate with the correct entities.
Check Collaboration -> Activity Feed for recent activities including chats and comments.
Confirm activity feed entries are accurate, timestamped, and order correct.

title: Quality Management - Audit Logs and Document Approvals
description: Ensure audit logs correctly record changes and document approvals process work according to workflow policies.

steps.description: Perform modifications on documents and system settings.
Verify all changes are recorded in the audit logs with user and timestamp.
Submit a document for approval and route through document approval workflow.
Check document approval statuses update accordingly and access controls enforce approval states.

title: Modal System - Validation and Error Handling During Entity Creation
description: Test all entity creation modals for proper input validation, error handling, and successful entity creation.

steps.description: Open creation modal for a variety of entities (lead, invoice, project, asset, employee, etc.).
Submit each modal with missing or invalid required fields.
Verify each modal displays relevant validation errors and blocks submission.
Submit modals with valid data.
Confirm entities are created successfully and reflected in their respective modules.

title: Authentication and Authorization Controls
description: Verify users are authorized only for permitted modules and features, with access denied otherwise.

steps.description: Login with user account having restricted permissions.
Attempt to access restricted modules and perform unauthorized actions.
Confirm access is denied with appropriate messaging or UI restrictions.
Login with admin user.
Access all modules and perform unrestricted actions.
Verify full access and functionality available to admin users.

title: System Settings Management - Update and Persistence
description: Test updating system-wide configurations and confirm that changes persist and take effect immediately or on reload.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings module.
Change various system settings such as default tax rates, user preferences, and notification configurations.
Save settings and reload the application.
Verify changes persist and application behavior aligns with updated configurations.

title: Performance Benchmark under Typical Load
description: Verify application responsiveness and performance meet standards when multiple modules and heavy data loads are in use.

steps.description: Login as a user with access to multiple modules.
Simulate typical workload: loading dashboards, performing CRUD operations across modules, and running reports.
Measure and verify response times are within acceptable limits (e.g., page loads under 2 seconds).
Ensure no data loss or UI freezes occur during the workload.
